to SWSTDWP
Create in game dir (where hl2.exe placed) directory named "SteamApps" and put there all your GCFs. GCFs names must be equal in revApps.ini

to willi3012
To which non-steam servers you are connecting? You can connect to friendly server in main menu (on top).

to SWSTDWP
Then you must check/uncheck all available/unavailable GCFs. Like this: http://bayimg.com/bakeNAAEP

to SWSTDWP
Or you can just change in rev.ini (in game dir) "CachePath=./SteamApps" to "CachePath=". Example: "CachePath=D:/Games/Steam/steamapps".
